name: Jane Smith
title: Visual Artist
bio: Creative visual artist with a passion for painting, sculpture, and digital art. My work explores the intersection of nature and technology.

projects.name: Nature's Embrace
projects.description: A series of paintings that capture the beauty and complexity of natural landscapes.

projects.name: Digital Dreams
projects.description: A collection of digital artworks that explore futuristic themes and abstract concepts.

projects.name: Urban Sculptures
projects.description: A series of sculptures inspired by urban environments and architectural forms.

projects.name: Urban Sculptures
projects.description: A series of sculptures inspired by urban environments and architectural forms.
